SELECT *, recentGamescore FROM nba_team
seasonid=#{seasonId} and
fullcnname like "%"#{name}"%" and
seasontype=#{seasonType} and
conference=#{conference} and
teamId=#{teamId} and
order by ${index} desc ;

SELECT t1.*, t2.*, t3.*, t1.recentGamescore FROM (SELECT teamid, pointspg,RANK() OVER (ORDER BY pointspg DESC) AS pointspg_rank, reboundsPG,RANK() OVER (ORDER BY reboundsPG DESC) AS reboundsPG_rank, assistsPG,RANK() OVER (ORDER BY assistsPG DESC) AS assistsPG_rank, stealsPG,RANK() OVER (ORDER BY stealsPG DESC) AS stealsPG_rank, blocksPG,RANK() OVER (ORDER BY blocksPG DESC) AS blocksPG_rank, recentGamescore FROM nba_team WHERE seasonid=#{seasonId} AND seasontype=#{seasonType})t1, (SELECT MAX(pointspg) AS pointspg_max, MAX(reboundsPG) AS reboundsPG_max, MAX(assistsPG) AS assistsPG_max, MAX(stealsPG) AS stealsPG_max, MAX(blocksPG) AS blocksPG_max FROM nba_team WHERE seasonid=#{seasonId} AND seasontype=#{seasonType})t2, (SELECT ROUND(AVG(pointspg),3) AS pointspg_avg, ROUND(AVG(reboundsPG),3) AS reboundsPG_avg, ROUND(AVG(assistsPG),3) AS assistsPG_avg, ROUND(AVG(stealsPG),3) AS stealsPG_avg, ROUND(AVG(blocksPG),3) AS blocksPG_avg FROM nba_team WHERE seasonid=#{seasonId} AND seasontype=#{seasonType})t3 WHERE t1.teamid=#{teamId} ;
